TEI.2.document_title: David Porter to Stephen F Austin, 12-26-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: David Porter to Austin, Vera Cruz, December 26, 1828. Informing Austin how to secure registry for a vessel. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 154
